languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас виновато склоняет голву.{/n} "Большая честь услышать подобное от самой Леди Орселлио, но я... вынужден отказаться. Мои шрамы — телесные и душевные — напоминание о совершенной ошибке. И ключ к..." {n}, — Ахиллеас запинается и заходится кашлем, —{/n} "...искуплению".

{n}Achilleas bows his head guiltily.{/n} "It is a great honour to hear such words from Lady Orsellio herself, and still... I must refuse. My scars, both physical and spiritual, are my reminder of the mistake I made. And my key to—" {n}A coughing fit interrupts his words.{/n} "...redemption."
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас виновато склоняет голву.{/n} "Большая честь услышать подобное от самой Леди Орселлио, но я... вынужден отказаться. Мои шрамы — телесные и душевные — напоминание о совершенной ошибке. И ключ к..." {n}, — Ахиллеас запинается и заходится кашлем, —{/n} "...искуплению".

My scars, both physical and spiritual, are my reminder of the mistake I made. And my key to—" {n}A coughing fit interrupts his words.{/n} "...redemption."

{n}Achilleas bows his head guiltily.{/n} "It is a great honour to hear such words from Lady Orsellio herself, and still... I must refuse. My scars, both physical and spiritual, are my reminder of the mistake I made. And my key to—" {n}A coughing fit interrupts his words.{/n} "...redemption."

{n}Achilleas bows his head guiltily.{/n} "It is a great honour to hear such words from Lady Orsellio herself, and still... I must refuse. My scars, both physical and spiritual, are my reminder of the mistake I made. And my key to—" {n}A coughing fit interrupts his words.{/n} "...redemption."

languages.text: {n}Achilleas baisse la tête d'un air coupable.{/n} « C'est un grand honneur d'entendre de telles paroles de la part de dame Orsellio en personne, et pourtant... je dois refuser. Mes cicatrices physiques et spirituelles sont autant de rappels constants de mon erreur. Elles sont ma clé vers... {n}Il s'interrompt, pris d'une quinte de toux.{/n} ... la rédemption. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows his head guiltily.{/n} "It is a great honour to hear such words from Lady Orsellio herself, and still... I must refuse. My scars, both physical and spiritual, are my reminder of the mistake I made. And my key to—" {n}A coughing fit interrupts his words.{/n} "...redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas baisse la tête d'un air coupable.{/n} « C'est un grand honneur d'entendre de telles paroles de la part de dame Orsellio en personne, et pourtant... je dois refuser. Mes cicatrices physiques et spirituelles sont autant de rappels constants de mon erreur. Elles sont ma clé vers... {n}Il s'interrompt, pris d'une quinte de toux.{/n} ... la rédemption. »

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯内疚地低下头。{/n}“能听到奥赛罗女士亲口说出这样的话，我感到非常荣幸。但是……我不得不拒绝您的援助。我的伤疤，无论是身体上的，还是精神上的，都在时刻提醒着我所犯的错误。它们是我……”{n}他咳嗽了一阵子。{/n}“……通向救赎的关键。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows his head guiltily.{/n} "It is a great honour to hear such words from Lady Orsellio herself, and still... I must refuse. My scars, both physical and spiritual, are my reminder of the mistake I made. And my key to—" {n}A coughing fit interrupts his words.{/n} "...redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯内疚地低下头。{/n}“能听到奥塞罗女士亲口说出这样的话，我感到非常荣幸。但是……我不得不拒绝您的援助。我的伤疤，无论是身体上的，还是精神上的，都在时刻提醒着我所犯的错误。它们是我……”{n}他咳嗽了一阵子。{/n}“……通向救赎的关键。”

languages.text: {n}Achilleas senkt schuldbewusst den Kopf.{/n} "Es ist eine große Ehre, solche Worte von Lady Orsellio selbst zu hören und doch ... muss ich ablehnen. Meine Narben, sowohl die körperlichen als auch die spirituellen, erinnern mich an meinen Fehler. Und sie sind der Schlüssel zur"{n}, ein Hustenanfall unterbricht seine Worte,{/n} "Erlösung".
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows his head guiltily.{/n} "It is a great honour to hear such words from Lady Orsellio herself, and still... I must refuse. My scars, both physical and spiritual, are my reminder of the mistake I made. And my key to—" {n}A coughing fit interrupts his words.{/n} "...redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas senkt schuldbewusst den Kopf.{/n} "Es ist eine große Ehre, solche Worte von Lady Orsellio selbst zu hören und doch ... muss ich ablehnen. Meine Narben, sowohl die körperlichen als auch die spirituellen, erinnern mich an meinen Fehler. Und sie sind der Schlüssel zur"{n}, ein Hustenanfall unterbricht seine Worte,{/n} "Erlösung".

languages.text: {n}Achilleas, sintiéndose culpable, inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Es un gran honor escuchar tales palabras de la mismísima Lady Orsellio, pero... Me temo que debo rechazar su ayuda. Mis cicatrices, tanto físicas como espirituales, son un recuerdo de los errores que he cometido. Y mi camino hacia...». {n}Le da un ataque de tos que interrumpe su discurso.{/n} «... la redención».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows his head guiltily.{/n} "It is a great honour to hear such words from Lady Orsellio herself, and still... I must refuse. My scars, both physical and spiritual, are my reminder of the mistake I made. And my key to—" {n}A coughing fit interrupts his words.{/n} "...redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas, sintiéndose culpable, inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Es un gran honor escuchar tales palabras de la mismísima Lady Orsellio, pero... Me temo que debo rechazar su ayuda. Mis cicatrices, tanto físicas como espirituales, son un recuerdo de los errores que he cometido. Y mi camino hacia...». {n}Le da un ataque de tos que interrumpe su discurso.{/n} «... la redención».

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは申し訳なさそうに頭を下げる。{/n}「オーセリオ様のお口からそのような言葉が聞けて光栄です。それでも…お断りしなければいけません。肉体的にも精神的にも、私の傷は、己の犯した間違いを思い出させるもの。そして、鍵でもあります…」{n}ゴホゴホという咳が男の言葉を遮る。{/n}「…贖罪の」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows his head guiltily.{/n} "It is a great honour to hear such words from Lady Orsellio herself, and still... I must refuse. My scars, both physical and spiritual, are my reminder of the mistake I made. And my key to—" {n}A coughing fit interrupts his words.{/n} "...redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは申し訳なさそうに頭を下げる。{/n}「オーセリオ様のお口からそのような言葉が聞けて光栄です。それでも…お断りしなければいけません。肉体的にも精神的にも、私の傷は、己の犯した間違いを思い出させるもの。そして、鍵でもあります…」{n}ゴホゴホという咳が男の言葉を遮る。{/n}「…贖罪の」

languages.text: {n}Achilleas, suçluluk içinde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bu sözleri bizzat Leydi Orsellio'dan duymak benim için bir onurdur... Ancak beni bağışlayın. Ruhumdaki ve bedenimdeki yaralar, hatalarımın hatırasıdır. Benim de..." {n}Öksürükleri, sözlerini bölüyor.{/n} "Kurtuluşumun anahtarı."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows his head guiltily.{/n} "It is a great honour to hear such words from Lady Orsellio herself, and still... I must refuse. My scars, both physical and spiritual, are my reminder of the mistake I made. And my key to—" {n}A coughing fit interrupts his words.{/n} "...redemption."
